titleStmt.title: The case of John Goudet, and David Barrau, partners, merchants. In relation to the petition of the Lustring Company. Presented to the honourable House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Half-title on p. [2]: The case of John Goudet and David Barrau, merchants, in relation to the petition of the Lustring Company.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library.
